verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Friday] [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: proudly] [V: tweeted] [ARG1: that a Republican report found no collusion between his 2016 presidential campaign and Russia] , and he threw a jab at Special Counsel Robert Mueller .

On Friday Donald Trump proudly tweeted that [ARG0: a Republican report] [V: found] [ARG1: no collusion between his 2016 presidential campaign and Russia] , and he threw a jab at Special Counsel Robert Mueller .

On Friday Donald Trump proudly tweeted that a Republican report found no collusion between his 2016 presidential campaign and Russia , and [ARG0: he] [V: threw] [ARG1: a jab] [ARG2: at Special Counsel Robert Mueller] .
